transcript:
Customer: Hello
Hanji boliye
Executive: Hello ji good afternoon sir meri baat RF steel private limited mein ho rahi hai.
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Ji sir main shraf baat kar raha tha IndiaMART ke head office se kaise hain sir aap.
Customer: Bas badhiya
Executive: Actually mein sir na aapke yahan se ek video meeting ki request aayi thi sir abhi.
Customer: Han request main hi kiya tha.
Executive: Achcha aapne kiya hai to main video meeting wahi kuch jankari aur chahiye tha ki matlab isko kaise handle karne ke liye jaise isme jo days show hote hain na buylead mein 30 days nahi show ho paati ki open karte hain apan daily daily isko use karte hain.
Customer: Achcha achcha
Executive: Han han
Customer: To wo nahi show ho paate hain buylead purchase karte hain calling karte hain.
Executive: Han han
Customer: Lekin usme kahin 22 din kabhi 24 din is tarah hota hai sir matlab kaise isko working proper tarike se kiya jaaye.
Executive: Han han working matlab aur kaise kare ki aur achcha aap log response IndiaMART se nikal sako na to pehle to na sir main dekho ab main thoda sa aapse probing karunga pehle to samjhunga abhi tak aapne kya kiya February se aapki services live hai aur abhi November chal raha hai theek hai sir to saat aath mahine aapne services use kari hogi hai na to usme kaisa response mila matlab customers mein.
Customer: Han
Customer: Customer dekhiye ek to pehle jo calling ka hota hai.
Customer: Jaise call aata hai na.
Executive: Han han call bhi aata hai.
Customer: Han call aata hai usi mein se deal hoti hai.
Customer: Abhi utna khas matlab jyada deal to nahi hoti hai mahine mein ek do teen is tarah deal ho jati hai.
Customer: Aur jaise buylead purchase karte hain direct message aate hain to usme se utna nahi hota wo to usme aisa rehta hai ki humne dekha hai aapka product dikh raha tha dekhe bas dekh ke chhod diye wahi.
Customer: To inquiry aa jati hai buylead ban ke aa jati hai.
Customer: Unko requirement aisa hai nahi jisko requirement rehti hai to 90% lagbhag ki wo call aata hai unka.
Customer: Abhi matlab aisa working apna chal raha hai.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Sun pa rahe hain.
Executive: Han sir abhi aawaz aa rahi hai lekin shayad meri aawaz kat kat ke aane lage yahan pe Jio ka na sir thoda network problem hai to beech beech mein hone lagta hai bata dijiyega aap.
Customer: Hmm theek hai ab main ye jaanna chahta tha sir meri baat Muneshwar Sahu ji se ho rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi Shailendra se ho rahi hai.
Executive: Shailendra ji ji achcha Shailendra ji to aap yahan pe matlab RF steel mein kam karte hain aap owner hai sir.
Customer: Han main yahan kam karta hun.
Executive: Achcha aap employee hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai okay ab theek hai theek hai dekho ab main kuch kuch cheeze apne taraf se bataunga theek hai sir jaise ki jo main yahan pe dekh pa raha hun samajh pa raha hun theek hai overall to abhi aapka jo IndiaMART pe jo rating hai na jo buyers aapko rate karte hain wo kafi achcha hai kafi matlab kafi hi achcha hai kyuki wo 4.9 rating is ha bada isliye nahi pa raha sir kyuki jitna man chaliye usme inquiry final hoga deal theek hai na unhi se hum rating mang sakte hain direct kisi se hum aise rating bhi nahi le sakte kyuki jo buyer wahan humse judega IndiaMART se wahan se call karega wahan se message karega unhi ko hum review ke liye bhej sakte hain.
Customer: Han han
Customer: Direct to kuch kisi ko bhej nahi sakte hain.
Customer: Jo hamare direct buyer hain hello.
Customer: Hello
Customer: Sun pa rahe hain sir.
Customer: Aawaz nahi aa raha aapka.
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello hello hello.
Customer: Aawaz nahi aa raha aapka break ho raha hai.
Customer: Hello
Customer: Whatsapp calling kijiye na sir direct.
Customer: Hello
summary:
Concerns:

- How to properly work with buyleads.

- Inquiries not converting into deals.

- Unable to increase rating on IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive is probing to understand the issues.

- Executive shared that the rating is good.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive started to explain the process.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, rating, inquiries, deals
